title: NETWORK CONNECT CRASH AFTER CHAMP SELECT
body: says " unable to connect to server. please check your connection and try again" every single time ive tried for the past couple days even though my connection is fine. ive tried every fix ive been able to find and nothings working PLEASE HALP{{champion:32}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: I already started a ticket before posting this because appearently riots whole support crew is one blitzcrank bot with a hextech repair link that hasnt helped my problem

Your internet is probably running pretty smoothly, but something is probably just giving your network a hard time connecting to our servers specifically. It's not out of the ordinary, and most of the time we just need to adjust a couple [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Do me a favor and run through those steps, and let me know if it helps!

Hmmmm let's go ahead and get you a little more one on one help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dive much deeper into your system than I can here on the boards, so you'll be in good hands with them ^_^!
